aquisicao-de-recurso-e-inicializacao.md:    	File config("config.txt"); // local object: aquired resource
aquisicao-de-recurso-e-inicializacao.md:    
aquisicao-de-recurso-e-inicializacao.md:    	// using config.txt
aquisicao-de-recurso-e-inicializacao.md:    	BlowUpFunction(); // an exception is thrown: config.txt is automagically released
aquisicao-de-recurso-e-inicializacao.md:    	// using config.txt
aquisicao-de-recurso-e-inicializacao.md:    
aquisicao-de-recurso-e-inicializacao.md:    	return 0; // the aquired resource  (config.txt) is released automagically
aquisicao-de-recurso-e-inicializacao.md:    } 
aquisicao-de-recurso-e-inicializacao.md:    
aquisicao-de-recurso-e-inicializacao.md:    class File2
aquisicao-de-recurso-e-inicializacao.md:    {
aquisicao-de-recurso-e-inicializacao.md:    public:
aquisicao-de-recurso-e-inicializacao.md:    	// the user MUST open the file before the object construction
aquisicao-de-recurso-e-inicializacao.md:    	DWORD Open(const char* fileName)
aquisicao-de-recurso-e-inicializacao.md:    	{
aquisicao-de-recurso-e-inicializacao.md:    		m_file = CreateFile(fileName, GENERIC_READ, FILE_SHARE_READ, 
aquisicao-de-recurso-e-inicializacao.md:    			NULL, OPEN_EXISTING, 0, NULL);
aquisicao-de-recurso-e-inicializacao.md:    	}
aquisicao-de-recurso-e-inicializacao.md:    
aquisicao-de-recurso-e-inicializacao.md:    	// ... and MUST close it before its destruction
aquisicao-de-recurso-e-inicializacao.md:    	void Close()
aquisicao-de-recurso-e-inicializacao.md:    	{
aquisicao-de-recurso-e-inicializacao.md:    		CloseHandle(m_file);
aquisicao-de-recurso-e-inicializacao.md:    		m_file = NULL;
aquisicao-de-recurso-e-inicializacao.md:    	}
aquisicao-de-recurso-e-inicializacao.md:    
aquisicao-de-recurso-e-inicializacao.md:    	HANDLE m_file; // aquired resource
aquisicao-de-recurso-e-inicializacao.md:    };
aquisicao-de-recurso-e-inicializacao.md:    
aquisicao-de-recurso-e-inicializacao.md:    int UseFile2()
aquisicao-de-recurso-e-inicializacao.md:    {
aquisicao-de-recurso-e-inicializacao.md:    	File2 config; // local object
aquisicao-de-recurso-e-inicializacao.md:    
aquisicao-de-recurso-e-inicializacao.md:    	config.Open("config.txt"); // aquired resource
aquisicao-de-recurso-e-inicializacao.md:    
aquisicao-de-recurso-e-inicializacao.md:    	// using config...
aquisicao-de-recurso-e-inicializacao.md:    	BlowUpFunction(); // exception thrown: the resource was NOT released
aquisicao-de-recurso-e-inicializacao.md:    	// using config...
aquisicao-de-recurso-e-inicializacao.md:    
aquisicao-de-recurso-e-inicializacao.md:    	config.Close(); // resource released
aquisicao-de-recurso-e-inicializacao.md:    
aquisicao-de-recurso-e-inicializacao.md:    	return 0;
aquisicao-de-recurso-e-inicializacao.md:    }

bazaar-e-fedora-8-a-saga.md:    #wget https://launchpad.net/bzr/1.3/1.3.1/+download/bzr-1.3.1.tar.gz
bazaar-e-fedora-8-a-saga.md:    #tar -zxvf bzr-1.3.1.tar.gz /* ele teve que me explicar esse comando singelo */
bazaar-e-fedora-8-a-saga.md:    #cd bzr-1.3.1
bazaar-e-fedora-8-a-saga.md:    #cat INSTALL
bazaar-e-fedora-8-a-saga.md:    
bazaar-e-fedora-8-a-saga.md:    Installation
bazaar-e-fedora-8-a-saga.md:    ------------
bazaar-e-fedora-8-a-saga.md:    
bazaar-e-fedora-8-a-saga.md:    When upgrading using setup.py, it is recommended that you first delete the
bazaar-e-fedora-8-a-saga.md:    bzrlib directory from the install target.
bazaar-e-fedora-8-a-saga.md:    
bazaar-e-fedora-8-a-saga.md:    To install bzr as a user, run
bazaar-e-fedora-8-a-saga.md:    
bazaar-e-fedora-8-a-saga.md:      python setup.py install --home ~
bazaar-e-fedora-8-a-saga.md:    
bazaar-e-fedora-8-a-saga.md:    To install system-wide, run (as root)
bazaar-e-fedora-8-a-saga.md:    
bazaar-e-fedora-8-a-saga.md:      python setup.py install
bazaar-e-fedora-8-a-saga.md:    
bazaar-e-fedora-8-a-saga.md:    #python setup.py install
bazaar-grafico.md:    
bazaar-grafico.md:    bzr help commands | grep ^q.*
bazaar-grafico.md:    
bazaar-grafico.md:    qadd                 GUI for adding files or directories. [qbzr]
bazaar-grafico.md:    qannotate            Show the origin of each line in a file. [qbzr]
bazaar-grafico.md:    qbranch              Create a new copy of a branch. [qbzr]
bazaar-grafico.md:    qbrowse              Show inventory. [qbzr]
bazaar-grafico.md:    qcat                 View the contents of a file as of a given revision. [qbzr]
bazaar-grafico.md:    qcommit              GUI for committing revisions. [qbzr]
bazaar-grafico.md:    qconfig              Configure Bazaar. [qbzr]
bazaar-grafico.md:    qdiff                Show differences in working tree in a GUI window. [qbzr]
bazaar-grafico.md:    qgetnew              Creates a new working tree (either a checkout or full branch) [qbzr]
bazaar-grafico.md:    qgetupdates          Fetches external changes into the working tree [qbzr]
bazaar-grafico.md:    qinfo                 [qbzr]
bazaar-grafico.md:    qinit                Initializes a new (possibly shared) repository. [qbzr]
bazaar-grafico.md:    qlog                 Show log of a repository, branch, file, or directory in a Qt window. [qbzr]
bazaar-grafico.md:    qmerge               Perform a three-way merge. [qbzr]
bazaar-grafico.md:    qpull                Turn this branch into a mirror of another branch. [qbzr]
bazaar-grafico.md:    qpush                Update a mirror of this branch. [qbzr]
bazaar-grafico.md:    qrevert              Revert changes files. [qbzr]
bazaar-grafico.md:    qtag                 Edit tags. [qbzr]
boost-bind-e-os-erros-escrotos.md:    #include <iostream>
boost-bind-e-os-erros-escrotos.md:    #include <boost/bind.hpp>
boost-bind-e-os-erros-escrotos.md:    
boost-bind-e-os-erros-escrotos.md:    template<class Handler>
boost-bind-e-os-erros-escrotos.md:    void CallHandler(Handler&& handler)
boost-bind-e-os-erros-escrotos.md:    {
boost-bind-e-os-erros-escrotos.md:        handler();
boost-bind-e-os-erros-escrotos.md:    }
boost-bind-e-os-erros-escrotos.md:    
boost-bind-e-os-erros-escrotos.md:    void handler1(int x, int y)
boost-bind-e-os-erros-escrotos.md:    {

boost-meta-state-machine.md:    using namespace std;
boost-meta-state-machine.md:    
boost-meta-state-machine.md:    namespace MyStateMachine
boost-meta-state-machine.md:    {
boost-meta-state-machine.md:        namespace msm = boost::msm;
boost-meta-state-machine.md:        namespace msmf = boost::msm::front;
boost-meta-state-machine.md:        namespace mpl = boost::mpl;
boost-meta-state-machine.md:    
boost-meta-state-machine.md:        namespace Events
boost-meta-state-machine.md:        {
boost-meta-state-machine.md:            struct Event1 {};
boost-meta-state-machine.md:            struct Event2 { int data; };
boost-meta-state-machine.md:            struct Event3 {};
boost-meta-state-machine.md:        }
boost-meta-state-machine.md:    
boost-meta-state-machine.md:        struct StateMachine :msmf::state_machine_def<StateMachine>
boost-meta-state-machine.md:        {
boost-meta-state-machine.md:            typedef msm::back::state_machine<StateMachine> SM;
boost-meta-state-machine.md:    
boost-meta-state-machine.md:            struct Off :msmf::terminate_state<> // Off is the last state
boost-meta-state-machine.md:            {
boost-meta-state-machine.md:                template <class Event, class Fsm>
boost-meta-state-machine.md:                void on_entry(Event const&, Fsm&) const
boost-meta-state-machine.md:                {
boost-meta-state-machine.md:                    cout << "on_entry Off generic event\n";
boost-meta-state-machine.md:                }
boost-meta-state-machine.md:            }; 
boost-meta-state-machine.md:    
boost-meta-state-machine.md:            struct On :msmf::state<>
boost-meta-state-machine.md:            {
boost-meta-state-machine.md:                template <class Event, class Fsm>
boost-meta-state-machine.md:                void on_entry(Event const&, Fsm&) const
boost-meta-state-machine.md:                {
boost-meta-state-machine.md:                    cout << "on_entry On generic event\n";
boost-meta-state-machine.md:                }
boost-meta-state-machine.md:    
boost-meta-state-machine.md:                template <class Fsm>
boost-meta-state-machine.md:                void on_entry(Events::Event1 const&, Fsm&) const
boost-meta-state-machine.md:                {
boost-meta-state-machine.md:                    cout << "on_entry On Event1\n";
boost-meta-state-machine.md:                }
boost-meta-state-machine.md:    
boost-meta-state-machine.md:                template <class Event, class Fsm>
boost-meta-state-machine.md:                void on_exit(Event const&, Fsm&) const
boost-meta-state-machine.md:                {
boost-meta-state-machine.md:                    cout << "on_exit On generic event\n";
boost-meta-state-machine.md:                }
boost-meta-state-machine.md:    
boost-meta-state-machine.md:                template <class Fsm>
boost-meta-state-machine.md:                void on_exit(Events::Event2 const& evt, Fsm&) const
boost-meta-state-machine.md:                {
boost-meta-state-machine.md:                    cout << "on_exit On Event2 (with data " << evt.data << ")\n";
boost-meta-state-machine.md:                }
boost-meta-state-machine.md:            };
boost-meta-state-machine.md:    
boost-meta-state-machine.md:            struct Tick :msmf::state<>
boost-meta-state-machine.md:            {
boost-meta-state-machine.md:                template <class Event, class Fsm>
boost-meta-state-machine.md:                void on_entry(Event const&, Fsm&) const
boost-meta-state-machine.md:                {
boost-meta-state-machine.md:                    cout << "on_entry Tick generic event\n";
boost-meta-state-machine.md:                }
boost-meta-state-machine.md:    
boost-meta-state-machine.md:                template <class Fsm>
boost-meta-state-machine.md:                void on_entry(Events::Event3 const&, Fsm&) const
boost-meta-state-machine.md:                {
boost-meta-state-machine.md:                    cout << "on_entry Tick Event3\n";
boost-meta-state-machine.md:                }
boost-meta-state-machine.md:    
boost-meta-state-machine.md:                template <class Event, class Fsm>
boost-meta-state-machine.md:                void on_exit(Event const&, Fsm&) const
boost-meta-state-machine.md:                {
boost-meta-state-machine.md:                    cout << "on_exit Tick generic event\n";
boost-meta-state-machine.md:                }
boost-meta-state-machine.md:            };
boost-meta-state-machine.md:    
boost-meta-state-machine.md:            typedef On initial_state; // On is the start
boost-meta-state-machine.md:    
boost-meta-state-machine.md:            struct transition_table :mpl::vector<
boost-meta-state-machine.md:                //          Start      Event                     Next               Action                      Guard
boost-meta-state-machine.md:                msmf::Row < On,        Events::Event1,           On,                msmf::none, msmf::none >,
boost-meta-state-machine.md:                msmf::Row < On,        Events::Event2,           Tick,              msmf::none, msmf::none >,
boost-meta-state-machine.md:                msmf::Row < Tick,      Events::Event3,           Tick,              msmf::none, msmf::none >,
boost-meta-state-machine.md:                msmf::Row < Tick,      Events::Event1,           On,                msmf::none, msmf::none >,
boost-meta-state-machine.md:                msmf::Row < Tick,      Events::Event2,           Off,               msmf::none, msmf::none >
boost-meta-state-machine.md:            > {};
boost-meta-state-machine.md:        };
boost-meta-state-machine.md:    
boost-meta-state-machine.md:        int TestPathway()
boost-meta-state-machine.md:        {
boost-meta-state-machine.md:            StateMachine::SM sm1;
boost-meta-state-machine.md:            sm1.start();
boost-meta-state-machine.md:            sm1.process_event(Events::Event1()); // keep in On
boost-meta-state-machine.md:            sm1.process_event(Events::Event2()); // to Tick
boost-meta-state-machine.md:            sm1.process_event(Events::Event3()); // keep in Tick
boost-meta-state-machine.md:            sm1.process_event(Events::Event1()); // back to On
boost-meta-state-machine.md:            sm1.process_event(Events::Event2 { 42 }); // back to Tick
boost-meta-state-machine.md:            sm1.process_event(Events::Event2()); // finish
boost-meta-state-machine.md:            return 0;
boost-meta-state-machine.md:        }
boost-meta-state-machine.md:    }
boost-meta-state-machine.md:    
boost-meta-state-machine.md:    int main()
boost-meta-state-machine.md:    {
boost-meta-state-machine.md:        MyStateMachine::TestPathway();
boost-meta-state-machine.md:    }
boost-meta-state-machine.md:    struct transition_table :mpl::vector<
boost-meta-state-machine.md:        //          Start      Event                     Next               Action                      Guard
boost-meta-state-machine.md:        msmf::Row < On,        Events::Event1,           On,                msmf::none, msmf::none >,
boost-meta-state-machine.md:        msmf::Row < On,        Events::Event2,           Tick,              msmf::none, msmf::none >,
boost-meta-state-machine.md:        msmf::Row < Tick,      Events::Event3,           Tick,              msmf::none, msmf::none >,
boost-meta-state-machine.md:        msmf::Row < Tick,      Events::Event1,           On,                msmf::none, msmf::none >,
boost-meta-state-machine.md:        msmf::Row < Tick,      Events::Event2,           Off,               msmf::none, msmf::none >
boost-meta-state-machine.md:    > {};
boost-meta-state-machine.md:    template <class Event, class Fsm>
boost-meta-state-machine.md:    void on_entry(Event const&, Fsm&) const
boost-meta-state-machine.md:    {
boost-meta-state-machine.md:        cout << "on_entry On generic event\n";
boost-meta-state-machine.md:    }
boost-meta-state-machine.md:    
boost-meta-state-machine.md:    template <class Fsm>
boost-meta-state-machine.md:    void on_entry(Events::Event1 const&, Fsm&) const
boost-meta-state-machine.md:    {
boost-meta-state-machine.md:        cout << "on_entry On Event1\n";
boost-meta-state-machine.md:    }
boost-meta-state-machine.md:

boost-meta-state-machine.md:    {

boost-meta-state-machine.md:    }
boost-meta-state-machine.md:

boost-meta-state-machine.md:    void on_exit(Events::Event2 const& evt, Fsm&) const
boost-meta-state-machine.md:    {
boost-meta-state-machine.md:        cout << "on_exit On Event2 (with data " << evt.data << ")\n";
boost-meta-state-machine.md:    }
boost-meta-state-machine.md:    struct StateMachine :msmf::state_machine_def<StateMachine>
boost-meta-state-machine.md:    //...
boost-meta-state-machine.md:    typedef On initial_state; // On is the start
boost-meta-state-machine.md:    struct Off :msmf::terminate_state<>
boost-meta-state-machine.md:    int TestPathway()
boost-meta-state-machine.md:    {
boost-meta-state-machine.md:        StateMachine::SM sm1;
boost-meta-state-machine.md:        sm1.start();
boost-meta-state-machine.md:        sm1.process_event(Events::Event1()); // keep in On
boost-meta-state-machine.md:        sm1.process_event(Events::Event2()); // to Tick
boost-meta-state-machine.md:        sm1.process_event(Events::Event3()); // keep in Tick
boost-meta-state-machine.md:        sm1.process_event(Events::Event1()); // back to On
boost-meta-state-machine.md:        sm1.process_event(Events::Event2 { 42 }); // back to Tick
boost-meta-state-machine.md:        sm1.process_event(Events::Event2()); // finish
boost-meta-state-machine.md:        return 0;
boost-meta-state-machine.md:    }

breaking-bad-s05.md:    I met a traveller from an antique land
breaking-bad-s05.md:    Who said: "Two vast and trunkless legs of stone
breaking-bad-s05.md:    Stand in the desert. Near them, on the sand,
breaking-bad-s05.md:    Half sunk, a shattered visage lies, whose frown,
breaking-bad-s05.md:    And wrinkled lip, and sneer of cold command,
breaking-bad-s05.md:    Tell that its sculptor well those passions read
breaking-bad-s05.md:    Which yet survive, stamped on these lifeless things,
breaking-bad-s05.md:    The hand that mocked them and the heart that fed:
breaking-bad-s05.md:    And on the pedestal these words appear:
breaking-bad-s05.md:    'My name is Ozymandias, king of kings:
breaking-bad-s05.md:    Look on my works, ye Mighty, and despair!'
breaking-bad-s05.md:    Nothing beside remains. Round the decay
breaking-bad-s05.md:    Of that colossal wreck, boundless and bare
breaking-bad-s05.md:    The lone and level sands stretch far away."

brincando-com-o-windbg.md:    int WINAPI MessageBox(
brincando-com-o-windbg.md:    	HWND hWnd,            // handle para o propretário da janela
brincando-com-o-windbg.md:    	LPCTSTR lpText,       // ponteiro para string que contém o texto a ser exibido
brincando-com-o-windbg.md:    	LPCTSTR lpCaption,    // ponteiro para string que contém o título a ser exibido
brincando-com-o-windbg.md:    	UINT uType            // personaliza a janela com ícones, comportamento, etc
brincando-com-o-windbg.md:    	);
brincando-com-o-windbg.md:    
brincando-com-o-windbg.md:    bp user32!MessageBoxW
brincando-com-o-windbg.md:    g
brincando-com-o-windbg.md:    
brincando-com-o-windbg.md:    Breakpoint 0 hit
brincando-com-o-windbg.md:    eax=0007cfb8 ebx=80004005 ecx=7e41ce0b edx=00000008 esi=00000208 edi=001b0296
brincando-com-o-windbg.md:    eip=7e46630a esp=0007cfa0 ebp=0007d9e4 iopl=0         nv up ei ng nz na pe nc
brincando-com-o-windbg.md:    cs=001b  ss=0023  ds=0023  es=0023  fs=003b  gs=0000             efl=00000286
brincando-com-o-windbg.md:    USER32!MessageBoxW:
brincando-com-o-windbg.md:    7e46630a 8bff            mov     edi,edi
brincando-com-o-windbg.md:    
brincando-com-o-windbg.md:    0:000> dd esp ; Dump de Double words
brincando-com-o-windbg.md:    0007cfa0  763db810 001b0296 0007cfb8 0007d5d0 <-- parâmetros do MessageBox (em vermelho)
brincando-com-o-windbg.md:    0007cfb0  00000030 00000187 00720041 00750071 <-- parâmetros do MessageBox (em vermelho)
brincando-com-o-windbg.md:    0007cfc0  00760069 0020006f 006e0069 00780065
brincando-com-o-windbg.md:    0007cfd0  00730069 00650074 0074006e 002e0065
brincando-com-o-windbg.md:    
brincando-com-o-windbg.md:    push uType               ; topo da pilha (esp) = 007cfb0, decrementado em 4 bytes (= double word)
brincando-com-o-windbg.md:    push lpCaption           ; esp = 007cfac (007cfb0 - 4), decrementado novamente...
brincando-com-o-windbg.md:    push lpText              ; esp = 007cfa8 (007cfac - 4)
brincando-com-o-windbg.md:    push hWnd                ; esp = 007cfa4 (007cfa8 - 4)
brincando-com-o-windbg.md:    call user32!MessageBoxW  ; push eip, esp = 007cfa4 - 4 = 007cfa0
brincando-com-o-windbg.md:    
brincando-com-o-windbg.md:    0007cfa0  763db810 001b0296 0007cfb8 0007d5d0
brincando-com-o-windbg.md:    0007cfb0  00000030 
brincando-com-o-windbg.md:    
brincando-com-o-windbg.md:    0007cfa0   ret    hWnd  lpText lpCaption
brincando-com-o-windbg.md:    0007cfb0  uType
brincando-com-o-windbg.md:    
brincando-com-o-windbg.md:    esp = ret
brincando-com-o-windbg.md:    esp + 4 = hWnd
brincando-com-o-windbg.md:    esp + 8 = lpText
brincando-com-o-windbg.md:    esp + c = lpCaption
brincando-com-o-windbg.md:    esp + 10 =  uType
brincando-com-o-windbg.md:    
brincando-com-o-windbg.md:    0:000> du poi(esp+8) <-- Dump de string Unicode do apontado (poi) do valor em esp+8 (lpText)
brincando-com-o-windbg.md:    0007cfb8  "Arquivo inexistente.txt.File not"
brincando-com-o-windbg.md:    0007cff8  " found..Please verify the correc"
brincando-com-o-windbg.md:    0007d038  "t file name was given."
brincando-com-o-windbg.md:    0:000> du poi(esp+c) <-- Dump de string Unicode do apontado (poi) do valor em esp+c (lpCaption)
brincando-com-o-windbg.md:    0007d5d0  "Open"
brincando-com-o-windbg.md:    
brincando-com-o-windbg.md:    0:004> bp user32!MessageBoxW "ezu poi(esp+8) \"Obrigado por utilizar o maravilhoso Bloco de Notas!\"; g"

c-and-c-operators-precedence-table.md:    a ? b , c : d
c-and-c-operators-precedence-table.md:    a ? ( b , c ) : d
c-and-c-operators-precedence-table.md:    ( a ? b ) , ( c : d )
c-and-c-operators-precedence-table.md:    conditional-expression:
c-and-c-operators-precedence-table.md:    logical-OR-expression
c-and-c-operators-precedence-table.md:    logical-OR-expression ? expression : conditional-expression
c-and-c-operators-precedence-table.md:    conditional-expression:
c-and-c-operators-precedence-table.md:    logical-OR-expression
c-and-c-operators-precedence-table.md:    logical-OR-expression ? expression : assignment-expression
c-and-c-operators-precedence-table.md:    e = a ? b : c = d
c-and-c-operators-precedence-table.md:    e = ( ( a ? b : c ) = d )
c-and-c-operators-precedence-table.md:    e = ( a ? b : ( c = d ) )
c-and-c-operators-precedence-table.md:    ( a ? b : c ) = d
c-and-c-operators-precedence-table.md:    ( a ? b : ( c ) = d )
c-resolve-tudo-clos.md:    (defgeneric thing(x y))
c-resolve-tudo-clos.md:    
c-resolve-tudo-clos.md:    ;; BAR inhherits FOO
c-resolve-tudo-clos.md:    (defclass foo()())
c-resolve-tudo-clos.md:    
c-resolve-tudo-clos.md:    (defmethod thing ((x foo) (y foo))
c-resolve-tudo-clos.md:      (format t "Both are of type FOO~%"))
c-resolve-tudo-clos.md:    
c-resolve-tudo-clos.md:    (def method thing ((x bar) (y foo))
c-resolve-tudo-clos.md:      (format t "X is a BAR, Y is a FOO. Next...~%")
c-resolve-tudo-clos.md:      (call-next-method))
c-resolve-tudo-clos.md:    
c-resolve-tudo-clos.md:    (def method thing ((x foo) (y bar))
c-resolve-tudo-clos.md:      (format t "X is a FOO, Y is a BAR. Next...~%")
c-resolve-tudo-clos.md:      (call-next-method))
c-resolve-tudo-clos.md:    
c-resolve-tudo-clos.md:    (defun test-dispatch ()
c-resolve-tudo-clos.md:      (let ((x (make-instance 'bar))
c-resolve-tudo-clos.md:            (y (make-instance 'bar)))
c-resolve-tudo-clos.md:        (thing x y)))
c-resolve-tudo-clos.md:    
c-resolve-tudo-clos.md:    output:
c-resolve-tudo-clos.md:    CL-USER> (test-dispatch)
c-resolve-tudo-clos.md:    X is a BAR, Y is a FOO. Next...
c-resolve-tudo-clos.md:    X is a FOO, Y is a BAR. Next...
c-resolve-tudo-clos.md:    Both are of type FOO
c-resolve-tudo-clos.md:    NIL
c-resolve-tudo-clos.md:    /* defclass(foo, cclass_instance); */
c-resolve-tudo-clos.md:    typedef struct foo_instance { cclass_instance type; } foo_instance;
c-resolve-tudo-clos.md:    static foo_instance foo = { "foo" };
c-resolve-tudo-clos.md:    
c-resolve-tudo-clos.md:    /* defclass(bar, foo); */
c-resolve-tudo-clos.md:    typedef struct bar_instance { cclass_instance type; } bar_instance; 
c-resolve-tudo-clos.md:    static bar_instance bar = { "bar" };
c-resolve-tudo-clos.md:    #include "cclos.h"
c-resolve-tudo-clos.md:    #include <stdarg.h>
c-resolve-tudo-clos.md:    #include <string.h>
c-resolve-tudo-clos.md:    #include <gmodule.h>
c-resolve-tudo-clos.md:    
c-resolve-tudo-clos.md:    
c-resolve-tudo-clos.md:    typedef GPtrArray Argv;
c-resolve-tudo-clos.md:    
c-resolve-tudo-clos.md:    typedef struct _Method
c-resolve-tudo-clos.md:    {
c-resolve-tudo-clos.md:    	void* fun;
c-resolve-tudo-clos.md:    	Argv* argv;
c-resolve-tudo-clos.md:    } Method;
c-resolve-tudo-clos.md:    
c-resolve-tudo-clos.md:    typedef void (*FP_Argv0)();
c-resolve-tudo-clos.md:    typedef void (*FP_Argv1)(cclass_instance*);
c-resolve-tudo-clos.md:    typedef void (*FP_Argv2)(cclass_instance*, cclass_instance*);
c-resolve-tudo-clos.md:    typedef void (*FP_Argv3)(cclass_instance*, cclass_instance*, cclass_instance*);
c-resolve-tudo-clos.md:    
c-resolve-tudo-clos.md:    typedef GHashTable ClassMap;
c-resolve-tudo-clos.md:    typedef GPtrArray Methods;
c-resolve-tudo-clos.md:    typedef GHashTable MethodMap;
c-resolve-tudo-clos.md:    
c-resolve-tudo-clos.md:    static ClassMap* g_classes;
c-resolve-tudo-clos.md:    static MethodMap* g_methods;
c-resolve-tudo-clos.md:    static Methods* g_calledMethods;
c-resolve-tudo-clos.md:    
c-resolve-tudo-clos.md:    
c-resolve-tudo-clos.md:    void cdefgeneric_initialize()
c-resolve-tudo-clos.md:    {
c-resolve-tudo-clos.md:    	g_classes = g_hash_table_new(g_str_hash, g_str_equal);
c-resolve-tudo-clos.md:    	g_methods = g_hash_table_new(g_str_hash, g_str_equal);
c-resolve-tudo-clos.md:    }
c-resolve-tudo-clos.md:    
c-resolve-tudo-clos.md:    
c-resolve-tudo-clos.md:    Method* method_new(void* fun, Argv* argv)
c-resolve-tudo-clos.md:    {
c-resolve-tudo-clos.md:    	Method* ret = (Method*)malloc(sizeof(Method));
c-resolve-tudo-clos.md:    	if (ret)
c-resolve-tudo-clos.md:    	{
c-resolve-tudo-clos.md:    		ret->fun = fun;
c-resolve-tudo-clos.md:    		ret->argv = argv ? argv : g_ptr_array_new();
c-resolve-tudo-clos.md:    	}
c-resolve-tudo-clos.md:    	return ret;
c-resolve-tudo-clos.md:    }
c-resolve-tudo-clos.md:    
c-resolve-tudo-clos.md:    Argv* method_free(Method* method, gboolean free_seg)
c-resolve-tudo-clos.md:    {
c-resolve-tudo-clos.md:    	Argv* ret = free_seg ? g_ptr_array_free(method->argv, TRUE), NULL : method->argv;
c-resolve-tudo-clos.md:    	free(method);
c-resolve-tudo-clos.md:    	return ret;
c-resolve-tudo-clos.md:    }
c-resolve-tudo-clos.md:    
c-resolve-tudo-clos.md:    
c-resolve-tudo-clos.md:    const char* defclass(const char* name, const char* deriv)
c-resolve-tudo-clos.md:    {
c-resolve-tudo-clos.md:    	gboolean insertOk = g_hash_table_insert(g_classes, (gpointer*)name, (gpointer*)deriv);
c-resolve-tudo-clos.md:    	return name;
c-resolve-tudo-clos.md:    }
c-resolve-tudo-clos.md:    
c-resolve-tudo-clos.md:    #define extractargv(argv, argc) \
c-resolve-tudo-clos.md:    		va_list vl; \
c-resolve-tudo-clos.md:    		va_start(vl, argc); \
c-resolve-tudo-clos.md:    		for (int i = 0; i < argc; ++i) \
c-resolve-tudo-clos.md:    		{ \
c-resolve-tudo-clos.md:    			cclass_instance* arg = va_arg(vl, cclass_instance*); \
c-resolve-tudo-clos.md:    			g_ptr_array_add(argv, arg); \
c-resolve-tudo-clos.md:    		}
c-resolve-tudo-clos.md:    
c-resolve-tudo-clos.md:    void defmethod(const char* name, void* fun, int argc, ...)
c-resolve-tudo-clos.md:    {
c-resolve-tudo-clos.md:    	Method* method = method_new(fun, NULL);
c-resolve-tudo-clos.md:    	Methods* methods = (Methods*)g_hash_table_lookup(g_methods, name);
c-resolve-tudo-clos.md:    	extractargv(method->argv, argc);
c-resolve-tudo-clos.md:    	if (!methods)
c-resolve-tudo-clos.md:    	{
c-resolve-tudo-clos.md:    		methods = g_ptr_array_new();
c-resolve-tudo-clos.md:    		g_hash_table_insert(g_methods, (gpointer) name, (gpointer) methods);
c-resolve-tudo-clos.md:    	}
c-resolve-tudo-clos.md:    	g_ptr_array_add(methods, method);
c-resolve-tudo-clos.md:    }
c-resolve-tudo-clos.md:    
c-resolve-tudo-clos.md:    void callmethod(const char* name, Method* method)
c-resolve-tudo-clos.md:    {
c-resolve-tudo-clos.md:    	g_ptr_array_add(g_calledMethods, (gpointer) method->fun);
c-resolve-tudo-clos.md:    	cclass_instance** argv = (cclass_instance * *)method->argv->pdata;
c-resolve-tudo-clos.md:    
c-resolve-tudo-clos.md:    	if (method->argv->len == 0)
c-resolve-tudo-clos.md:    	{
c-resolve-tudo-clos.md:    		FP_Argv0 fun = (FP_Argv0)method->fun;
c-resolve-tudo-clos.md:    		fun();
c-resolve-tudo-clos.md:    	}
c-resolve-tudo-clos.md:    	else if (method->argv->len == 1)
c-resolve-tudo-clos.md:    	{
c-resolve-tudo-clos.md:    		FP_Argv1 fun = (FP_Argv1)method->fun;
c-resolve-tudo-clos.md:    		fun(argv[0]);
c-resolve-tudo-clos.md:    	}
c-resolve-tudo-clos.md:    	else if (method->argv->len == 2)
c-resolve-tudo-clos.md:    	{
c-resolve-tudo-clos.md:    		FP_Argv2 fun = (FP_Argv2)method->fun;
c-resolve-tudo-clos.md:    		fun(argv[0], argv[1]);
c-resolve-tudo-clos.md:    	}
c-resolve-tudo-clos.md:    	else if (method->argv->len == 3)
c-resolve-tudo-clos.md:    	{
c-resolve-tudo-clos.md:    		FP_Argv3 fun = (FP_Argv3)method->fun;
c-resolve-tudo-clos.md:    		fun(argv[0], argv[1], argv[2]);
c-resolve-tudo-clos.md:    	}
c-resolve-tudo-clos.md:    }
c-resolve-tudo-clos.md:    
c-resolve-tudo-clos.md:    Method* find_method_by_fun(const char* name, void* fun)
c-resolve-tudo-clos.md:    {
c-resolve-tudo-clos.md:    	Method* method = NULL;
c-resolve-tudo-clos.md:    	Methods* methods = (Methods*) g_hash_table_lookup(g_methods, name);
c-resolve-tudo-clos.md:    	if (methods)
c-resolve-tudo-clos.md:    	{
c-resolve-tudo-clos.md:    		Method** meths = (Method**)methods->pdata;
c-resolve-tudo-clos.md:    		guint i = 0;
c-resolve-tudo-clos.md:    		while (i < methods->len)
c-resolve-tudo-clos.md:    		{
c-resolve-tudo-clos.md:    			Method* m = meths[i];
c-resolve-tudo-clos.md:    			if (m->fun == fun)
c-resolve-tudo-clos.md:    			{
c-resolve-tudo-clos.md:    				method = m;
c-resolve-tudo-clos.md:    				break;
c-resolve-tudo-clos.md:    			}
c-resolve-tudo-clos.md:    			++i;
c-resolve-tudo-clos.md:    		}
c-resolve-tudo-clos.md:    	}
c-resolve-tudo-clos.md:    	return method;
c-resolve-tudo-clos.md:    }
c-resolve-tudo-clos.md:    
c-resolve-tudo-clos.md:    int calcdistance_arg(cclass_instance* arg, cclass_instance* underpromo)
c-resolve-tudo-clos.md:    {
c-resolve-tudo-clos.md:    	int ret = 0;
c-resolve-tudo-clos.md:    	char* promo = (char*)arg->type;
c-resolve-tudo-clos.md:    
c-resolve-tudo-clos.md:    	while (strcmp(promo, underpromo->type) != 0)
c-resolve-tudo-clos.md:    	{
c-resolve-tudo-clos.md:    		promo = (char*)g_hash_table_lookup(g_classes, (gpointer*)promo);
c-resolve-tudo-clos.md:    		if (!promo || strlen(promo) == 0)
c-resolve-tudo-clos.md:    		{
c-resolve-tudo-clos.md:    			ret = -1;
c-resolve-tudo-clos.md:    			break;
c-resolve-tudo-clos.md:    		}
c-resolve-tudo-clos.md:    		++ret;
c-resolve-tudo-clos.md:    	}
c-resolve-tudo-clos.md:    
c-resolve-tudo-clos.md:    	return ret;
c-resolve-tudo-clos.md:    }
c-resolve-tudo-clos.md:    
c-resolve-tudo-clos.md:    int calcdistance(cclass_instance** args, cclass_instance** underpromo, int len)
c-resolve-tudo-clos.md:    {
c-resolve-tudo-clos.md:    	int ret = 0;
c-resolve-tudo-clos.md:    	for (int i = 0; i < len; ++i)
c-resolve-tudo-clos.md:    	{
c-resolve-tudo-clos.md:    		int dist = calcdistance_arg(args[i], underpromo[i]);
c-resolve-tudo-clos.md:    		if (dist == -1) return -1;
c-resolve-tudo-clos.md:    		ret += dist;
c-resolve-tudo-clos.md:    	}
c-resolve-tudo-clos.md:    	return ret;
c-resolve-tudo-clos.md:    }
c-resolve-tudo-clos.md:    
c-resolve-tudo-clos.md:    void call_next_method(const char* name, int argc, ...)
c-resolve-tudo-clos.md:    {
c-resolve-tudo-clos.md:    	Method* method = method_new(NULL, NULL);
c-resolve-tudo-clos.md:    	extractargv(method->argv, argc);
c-resolve-tudo-clos.md:    
c-resolve-tudo-clos.md:    	int nextdist = 666;
c-resolve-tudo-clos.md:    	Methods* methods = (Methods*)g_hash_table_lookup(g_methods, name);
c-resolve-tudo-clos.md:    	if (methods)
c-resolve-tudo-clos.md:    	{
c-resolve-tudo-clos.md:    		guint i = 0;
c-resolve-tudo-clos.md:    		while( i < methods->len )
c-resolve-tudo-clos.md:    		{
c-resolve-tudo-clos.md:    			Method* m = ((Method * *)methods->pdata)[i];
c-resolve-tudo-clos.md:    			gboolean alreadyCalled = FALSE;
c-resolve-tudo-clos.md:    			guint cms = 0;
c-resolve-tudo-clos.md:    
c-resolve-tudo-clos.md:    			while (cms < g_calledMethods->len)
c-resolve-tudo-clos.md:    			{
c-resolve-tudo-clos.md:    				void* fun = ((void **)g_calledMethods->pdata)[cms];
c-resolve-tudo-clos.md:    				if (fun == m->fun)
c-resolve-tudo-clos.md:    				{
c-resolve-tudo-clos.md:    					alreadyCalled = TRUE;
c-resolve-tudo-clos.md:    					break;
c-resolve-tudo-clos.md:    				}
c-resolve-tudo-clos.md:    				++cms;
c-resolve-tudo-clos.md:    			}
c-resolve-tudo-clos.md:    
c-resolve-tudo-clos.md:    			if ( ! alreadyCalled)
c-resolve-tudo-clos.md:    			{
c-resolve-tudo-clos.md:    				int dist = -1;
c-resolve-tudo-clos.md:    
c-resolve-tudo-clos.md:    				if (method->argv->len == m->argv->len)
c-resolve-tudo-clos.md:    					dist = calcdistance((cclass_instance * *)method->argv->pdata, (cclass_instance * *)m->argv->pdata, method->argv->len);
c-resolve-tudo-clos.md:    
c-resolve-tudo-clos.md:    				if (dist >= 0 && dist < nextdist)
c-resolve-tudo-clos.md:    				{
c-resolve-tudo-clos.md:    					if (dist < nextdist)
c-resolve-tudo-clos.md:    					{
c-resolve-tudo-clos.md:    						method->fun = m->fun;
c-resolve-tudo-clos.md:    						nextdist = dist;
c-resolve-tudo-clos.md:    					}
c-resolve-tudo-clos.md:    				}
c-resolve-tudo-clos.md:    			}
c-resolve-tudo-clos.md:    
c-resolve-tudo-clos.md:    			++i;
c-resolve-tudo-clos.md:    		}
c-resolve-tudo-clos.md:    
c-resolve-tudo-clos.md:    		if (method->fun)
c-resolve-tudo-clos.md:    			callmethod(name, method);
c-resolve-tudo-clos.md:    	}
c-resolve-tudo-clos.md:    }
c-resolve-tudo-clos.md:    
c-resolve-tudo-clos.md:    void call(const char* name, int argc, ...)
c-resolve-tudo-clos.md:    {
c-resolve-tudo-clos.md:    	g_calledMethods = g_ptr_array_new();
c-resolve-tudo-clos.md:    
c-resolve-tudo-clos.md:    	Method* method = method_new(NULL, NULL);
c-resolve-tudo-clos.md:    	extractargv(method->argv, argc);
c-resolve-tudo-clos.md:    
c-resolve-tudo-clos.md:    	int nextdist = 666;
c-resolve-tudo-clos.md:    	Methods* methods = g_hash_table_lookup(g_methods, name);
c-resolve-tudo-clos.md:    	if (methods)
c-resolve-tudo-clos.md:    	{
c-resolve-tudo-clos.md:    		guint i = 0;
c-resolve-tudo-clos.md:    		while( i < methods->len )
c-resolve-tudo-clos.md:    		{
c-resolve-tudo-clos.md:    			Method* m = ((Method * *)methods->pdata)[i];
c-resolve-tudo-clos.md:    			int dist = -1;
c-resolve-tudo-clos.md:    
c-resolve-tudo-clos.md:    			if (method->argv->len == m->argv->len)
c-resolve-tudo-clos.md:    				dist = calcdistance((cclass_instance * *)method->argv->pdata, (cclass_instance * *)m->argv->pdata, method->argv->len);
c-resolve-tudo-clos.md:    
c-resolve-tudo-clos.md:    			if (dist >= 0 && dist < nextdist)
c-resolve-tudo-clos.md:    			{
c-resolve-tudo-clos.md:    				if (dist < nextdist)
c-resolve-tudo-clos.md:    				{
c-resolve-tudo-clos.md:    					method->fun = m->fun;
c-resolve-tudo-clos.md:    					nextdist = dist;
c-resolve-tudo-clos.md:    				}
c-resolve-tudo-clos.md:    			}
c-resolve-tudo-clos.md:    
c-resolve-tudo-clos.md:    			++i;
c-resolve-tudo-clos.md:    		}
c-resolve-tudo-clos.md:    
c-resolve-tudo-clos.md:    		if (method->fun)
c-resolve-tudo-clos.md:    			callmethod(name, method);
c-resolve-tudo-clos.md:    	}
c-resolve-tudo-clos.md:    
c-resolve-tudo-clos.md:    	method_free(method, TRUE);
c-resolve-tudo-clos.md:    }
c-resolve-tudo-clos.md:    
c-resolve-tudo-clos.md:    #include "cclos.h"
c-resolve-tudo-clos.md:    #include <stdio.h>
c-resolve-tudo-clos.md:    
c-resolve-tudo-clos.md:    /* defclass(foo, cclass_instance); */
c-resolve-tudo-clos.md:    typedef struct foo_instance { cclass_instance type; } foo_instance;
c-resolve-tudo-clos.md:    static foo_instance foo = { "foo" };
c-resolve-tudo-clos.md:    
c-resolve-tudo-clos.md:    /* defclass(bar, foo); */
c-resolve-tudo-clos.md:    typedef struct bar_instance { cclass_instance type; } bar_instance; 
c-resolve-tudo-clos.md:    static bar_instance bar = { "bar" };
c-resolve-tudo-clos.md:    
c-resolve-tudo-clos.md:    void test_dispatch()
c-resolve-tudo-clos.md:    {
c-resolve-tudo-clos.md:    	bar_instance x = bar;
c-resolve-tudo-clos.md:    	bar_instance y = bar;
c-resolve-tudo-clos.md:    	call("thing", 2, &x, &y);
c-resolve-tudo-clos.md:    }
c-resolve-tudo-clos.md:    
c-resolve-tudo-clos.md:    void thing_foo_foo(cclass_instance* x, cclass_instance* y)
c-resolve-tudo-clos.md:    {
c-resolve-tudo-clos.md:    	printf("Both are of type FOO\n");
c-resolve-tudo-clos.md:    }
c-resolve-tudo-clos.md:    
c-resolve-tudo-clos.md:    void thing_bar_foo(cclass_instance* x, cclass_instance* y)
c-resolve-tudo-clos.md:    {
c-resolve-tudo-clos.md:    	printf("X is BAR, Y is FOO. Next...\n");
c-resolve-tudo-clos.md:    	call_next_method("thing", 2, x, y);
c-resolve-tudo-clos.md:    }
c-resolve-tudo-clos.md:    
c-resolve-tudo-clos.md:    void thing_foo_bar(cclass_instance* x, cclass_instance* y)
c-resolve-tudo-clos.md:    {
c-resolve-tudo-clos.md:    	printf("X is FOO, Y is BAR. Next...\n");
c-resolve-tudo-clos.md:    	call_next_method("thing", 2, x, y);
c-resolve-tudo-clos.md:    }
c-resolve-tudo-clos.md:    
c-resolve-tudo-clos.md:    int main()
c-resolve-tudo-clos.md:    {
c-resolve-tudo-clos.md:    	cdefgeneric_initialize();
c-resolve-tudo-clos.md:    	defclass("foo", "cclass");
c-resolve-tudo-clos.md:    	defclass("bar", "foo");
c-resolve-tudo-clos.md:    	defmethod("thing", &thing_foo_foo, 2, &foo, &foo);
c-resolve-tudo-clos.md:    	defmethod("thing", &thing_bar_foo, 2, &bar, &foo);
c-resolve-tudo-clos.md:    	defmethod("thing", &thing_foo_bar, 2, &foo, &bar);
c-resolve-tudo-clos.md:    	test_dispatch();
c-resolve-tudo-clos.md:    }
c-resolve-tudo.md:    struct MyClass
c-resolve-tudo.md:    {
c-resolve-tudo.md:        int x, y;
c-resolve-tudo.md:        void (*method)(int);
c-resolve-tudo.md:    };
c-resolve-tudo.md:    
c-resolve-tudo.md:    void method(int x)
c-resolve-tudo.md:    {
c-resolve-tudo.md:    }
c-resolve-tudo.md:    
c-resolve-tudo.md:    struct MyClass NewMyClass()
c-resolve-tudo.md:    {
c-resolve-tudo.md:        struct MyClass ret = { 0, 0 };
c-resolve-tudo.md:        ret.method = &method;
c-resolve-tudo.md:        return ret;
c-resolve-tudo.md:    }
c-resolve-tudo.md:    
c-resolve-tudo.md:    int main()
c-resolve-tudo.md:    {
c-resolve-tudo.md:        struct MyClass obj = NewMyClass();
c-resolve-tudo.md:        obj.method(10);
c-resolve-tudo.md:    }
c-resolve-tudo.md:    struct MyClass
c-resolve-tudo.md:    {
c-resolve-tudo.md:        int x, y;
c-resolve-tudo.md:        void (*method)(int);
c-resolve-tudo.md:    };
c-resolve-tudo.md:    
c-resolve-tudo.md:    void method(int x)
c-resolve-tudo.md:    {
c-resolve-tudo.md:    }
c-resolve-tudo.md:

c-resolve-tudo.md:    {
c-resolve-tudo.md:        struct MyClass ret = { 0, 0 };
c-resolve-tudo.md:        ret.method = &method;
c-resolve-tudo.md:        return ret;
c-resolve-tudo.md:    }
c-resolve-tudo.md:    
c-resolve-tudo.md:    void method2(int x)
c-resolve-tudo.md:    {
c-resolve-tudo.md:    }
c-resolve-tudo.md:

c-resolve-tudo.md:    {

c-resolve-tudo.md:        return ret;

c-resolve-tudo.md:    #include <stdio.h>
c-resolve-tudo.md:    
c-resolve-tudo.md:    typedef struct SCalc
c-resolve-tudo.md:    {
c-resolve-tudo.md:        int (*sum)(int, int);
c-resolve-tudo.md:        int (*mult)(struct SCalc*, int, int);
c-resolve-tudo.md:    
c-resolve-tudo.md:    } Calc;
c-resolve-tudo.md:    
c-resolve-tudo.md:    int calc_sum(int x, int y)
c-resolve-tudo.md:    {
c-resolve-tudo.md:        return x + y;
c-resolve-tudo.md:    }
c-resolve-tudo.md:    
c-resolve-tudo.md:    int calc_mult(Calc* calc, int x, int y)
c-resolve-tudo.md:    {
c-resolve-tudo.md:        int ret = 0;
c-resolve-tudo.md:        int i;
c-resolve-tudo.md:        for( i = 0; i < x; ++i )
c-resolve-tudo.md:            ret = calc->sum(ret, y);
c-resolve-tudo.md:        return ret;
c-resolve-tudo.md:    }
c-resolve-tudo.md:    
c-resolve-tudo.md:    Calc CalcNew()
c-resolve-tudo.md:    {
c-resolve-tudo.md:        Calc calc;
c-resolve-tudo.md:        calc.sum = &calc_sum;
c-resolve-tudo.md:        calc.mult = &calc_mult;
c-resolve-tudo.md:        return calc;
c-resolve-tudo.md:    }
c-resolve-tudo.md:    
c-resolve-tudo.md:    int main()
c-resolve-tudo.md:    {
c-resolve-tudo.md:        Calc calc = CalcNew();
c-resolve-tudo.md:        int x = 10, y = 32;
c-resolve-tudo.md:        int z = calc.sum(x, y);
c-resolve-tudo.md:        int k = calc.mult(&calc, z, y);
c-resolve-tudo.md:        printf("%d + %d = %d, %d * %d = %d\n", x, y, z, z, y, k);
c-resolve-tudo.md:    }
c-resolve-tudo.md:    10 + 32 = 42, 42 * 32 = 1344
c-resolve-tudo.md:    #include <stdio.h>
c-resolve-tudo.md:    #include <stdlib.h>
c-resolve-tudo.md:    
c-resolve-tudo.md:    typedef struct SCalc
c-resolve-tudo.md:    {
c-resolve-tudo.md:        int (*sum)(int, int);
c-resolve-tudo.md:        int (*mult)(struct SCalc*, int, int);
c-resolve-tudo.md:    
c-resolve-tudo.md:    } Calc;
c-resolve-tudo.md:    
c-resolve-tudo.md:    int calc_sum(int x, int y)
c-resolve-tudo.md:    {
c-resolve-tudo.md:        return x + y;
c-resolve-tudo.md:    }
c-resolve-tudo.md:    
c-resolve-tudo.md:    int calc_mult(Calc* calc, int x, int y)
c-resolve-tudo.md:    {
c-resolve-tudo.md:        int ret = 0;
c-resolve-tudo.md:        int i;
c-resolve-tudo.md:        for( i = 0; i < x; ++i )
c-resolve-tudo.md:            ret = calc->sum(ret, y);
c-resolve-tudo.md:        return ret;
c-resolve-tudo.md:    }
c-resolve-tudo.md:    
c-resolve-tudo.md:    Calc CalcNew()
c-resolve-tudo.md:    {
c-resolve-tudo.md:        Calc calc;
c-resolve-tudo.md:        calc.sum = &calc_sum;
c-resolve-tudo.md:        calc.mult = &calc_mult;
c-resolve-tudo.md:        return calc;
c-resolve-tudo.md:    }
c-resolve-tudo.md:    
c-resolve-tudo.md:    
c-resolve-tudo.md:    int calc_cat(int x, int y)
c-resolve-tudo.md:    {
c-resolve-tudo.md:        char buf[100];
c-resolve-tudo.md:        int ret;
c-resolve-tudo.md:        sprintf(buf, "%d%d", x, y);
c-resolve-tudo.md:        ret = atoi(buf);
c-resolve-tudo.md:        return ret;
c-resolve-tudo.md:    }
c-resolve-tudo.md:    
c-resolve-tudo.md:    Calc BizarreCalcNew()
c-resolve-tudo.md:    {
c-resolve-tudo.md:        Calc calc = CalcNew();
c-resolve-tudo.md:        calc.sum = &calc_cat;
c-resolve-tudo.md:        return calc;
c-resolve-tudo.md:    }
c-resolve-tudo.md:    
c-resolve-tudo.md:    int main()
c-resolve-tudo.md:    {
c-resolve-tudo.md:        Calc calc = BizarreCalcNew();
c-resolve-tudo.md:        int x = 1, y = 1;
c-resolve-tudo.md:        int z = calc.sum(x, y);
c-resolve-tudo.md:        int k = calc.mult(&calc, z, y);
c-resolve-tudo.md:        printf("%d + %d = %d, %d * %d = %d\n", x, y, z, z, y, k);
c-resolve-tudo.md:    }
c-resolve-tudo.md:    10 + 32 = 1032, 1032 * 32 = 2147483647

carregando-dlls-arbitrarias-pelo-windbg-parte-2.md:    Executable search path is:
carregando-dlls-arbitrarias-pelo-windbg-parte-2.md:    ModLoad: 01000000 01014000   notepad.exe
carregando-dlls-arbitrarias-pelo-windbg-parte-2.md:    ModLoad: 7c900000 7c9b0000   ntdll.dll
carregando-dlls-arbitrarias-pelo-windbg-parte-2.md:    ModLoad: 7c800000 7c8f5000   C:\WINDOWS\system32\kernel32.dll
carregando-dlls-arbitrarias-pelo-windbg-parte-2.md:    ...
carregando-dlls-arbitrarias-pelo-windbg-parte-2.md:    ModLoad: 73000000 73026000   C:\WINDOWS\system32\WINSPOOL.DRV

carregando-dlls-arbitrarias-pelo-windbg-parte-2.md:    eip=7c901230 esp=0007fb20 ebp=0007fc94 iopl=0         nv up ei pl nz na po nc
carregando-dlls-arbitrarias-pelo-windbg-parte-2.md:    cs=001b  ss=0023  ds=0023  es=0023  fs=003b  gs=0000             efl=00000202
carregando-dlls-arbitrarias-pelo-windbg-parte-2.md:    ntdll!DbgBreakPoint:
carregando-dlls-arbitrarias-pelo-windbg-parte-2.md:    7c901230 cc              int     3
carregando-dlls-arbitrarias-pelo-windbg-parte-2.md:    
carregando-dlls-arbitrarias-pelo-windbg-parte-2.md:    $$
carregando-dlls-arbitrarias-pelo-windbg-parte-2.md:    $$ @brief Loads a module inside the debuggee process.
carregando-dlls-arbitrarias-pelo-windbg-parte-2.md:    $$ @author Wanderley Caloni <wanderley@caloni.com.br>
carregando-dlls-arbitrarias-pelo-windbg-parte-2.md:    $$ @date 2007-11
carregando-dlls-arbitrarias-pelo-windbg-parte-2.md:    $$
carregando-dlls-arbitrarias-pelo-windbg-parte-2.md:    .if( ${/d:$arg1} )
carregando-dlls-arbitrarias-pelo-windbg-parte-2.md:    {
carregando-dlls-arbitrarias-pelo-windbg-parte-2.md:        r $t2 = @$ip
carregando-dlls-arbitrarias-pelo-windbg-parte-2.md:        .foreach /pS 5 ( addr { .dvalloc 0x1000 } ) { r$t0 = addr }
carregando-dlls-arbitrarias-pelo-windbg-parte-2.md:        r $t1 = @$t0 + 0x100
carregando-dlls-arbitrarias-pelo-windbg-parte-2.md:        eza @$t0 "${$arg1}"
carregando-dlls-arbitrarias-pelo-windbg-parte-2.md:        .echo Trying to load the following module:
carregando-dlls-arbitrarias-pelo-windbg-parte-2.md:        da @$t0
carregando-dlls-arbitrarias-pelo-windbg-parte-2.md:        $$ push $ip
carregando-dlls-arbitrarias-pelo-windbg-parte-2.md:        eb @$t1 0x68
carregando-dlls-arbitrarias-pelo-windbg-parte-2.md:        ed @$t1 + 0x01 @$t2
carregando-dlls-arbitrarias-pelo-windbg-parte-2.md:        $$ pushfd
carregando-dlls-arbitrarias-pelo-windbg-parte-2.md:        eb @$t1 + 0x05 0x9c
carregando-dlls-arbitrarias-pelo-windbg-parte-2.md:        $$ pushad
carregando-dlls-arbitrarias-pelo-windbg-parte-2.md:        eb @$t1 + 0x06 0x60
carregando-dlls-arbitrarias-pelo-windbg-parte-2.md:        $$ push $t0
carregando-dlls-arbitrarias-pelo-windbg-parte-2.md:        eb @$t1 + 0x07 0x68
carregando-dlls-arbitrarias-pelo-windbg-parte-2.md:        ed @$t1 + 0x08 @$t0
carregando-dlls-arbitrarias-pelo-windbg-parte-2.md:        $$ call LoadLibrary
carregando-dlls-arbitrarias-pelo-windbg-parte-2.md:        eb @$t1 + 0x0c 0xe8
carregando-dlls-arbitrarias-pelo-windbg-parte-2.md:        ed @$t1 + 0x0d ( kernel32!LoadLibraryA - @$t1 - 0x11 )
carregando-dlls-arbitrarias-pelo-windbg-parte-2.md:        $$ popad
carregando-dlls-arbitrarias-pelo-windbg-parte-2.md:        eb @$t1 + 0x11 0x61
carregando-dlls-arbitrarias-pelo-windbg-parte-2.md:        $$ popfd
carregando-dlls-arbitrarias-pelo-windbg-parte-2.md:        eb @$t1 + 0x12 0x9d
carregando-dlls-arbitrarias-pelo-windbg-parte-2.md:        $$ ret
carregando-dlls-arbitrarias-pelo-windbg-parte-2.md:        eb @$t1 + 0x13 0xc3
carregando-dlls-arbitrarias-pelo-windbg-parte-2.md:        r $ip = @$t1
carregando-dlls-arbitrarias-pelo-windbg-parte-2.md:        bp /1 @$t2 ".dvfree @$t0 0"
carregando-dlls-arbitrarias-pelo-windbg-parte-2.md:        g
carregando-dlls-arbitrarias-pelo-windbg-parte-2.md:    }
carregando-dlls-arbitrarias-pelo-windbg-parte-2.md:    .else
carregando-dlls-arbitrarias-pelo-windbg-parte-2.md:    {
carregando-dlls-arbitrarias-pelo-windbg-parte-2.md:       .echo How to use:
carregando-dlls-arbitrarias-pelo-windbg-parte-2.md:       .echo $$>a<path\LoadLibrary.txt mydll.dll
carregando-dlls-arbitrarias-pelo-windbg-parte-2.md:       .echo $$>a<path\LoadLibrary.txt c:\\path\\mydll.dll
carregando-dlls-arbitrarias-pelo-windbg-parte-2.md:       .echo $$>a<path\LoadLibrary.txt "c:\\path with space\\mydll.dll"
carregando-dlls-arbitrarias-pelo-windbg-parte-2.md:    }
carregando-dlls-arbitrarias-pelo-windbg-parte-2.md:    
carregando-dlls-arbitrarias-pelo-windbg-parte-2.md:    .if( ${/d:$arg1} )
carregando-dlls-arbitrarias-pelo-windbg-parte-2.md:    {
carregando-dlls-arbitrarias-pelo-windbg-parte-2.md:       ...
carregando-dlls-arbitrarias-pelo-windbg-parte-2.md:    }
carregando-dlls-arbitrarias-pelo-windbg-parte-2.md:    .else
carregando-dlls-arbitrarias-pelo-windbg-parte-2.md:    {
carregando-dlls-arbitrarias-pelo-windbg-parte-2.md:       ...
carregando-dlls-arbitrarias-pelo-windbg-parte-2.md:    }
carregando-dlls-arbitrarias-pelo-windbg-parte-2.md:    
carregando-dlls-arbitrarias-pelo-windbg-parte-2.md:        r $t2 = @$ip
carregando-dlls-arbitrarias-pelo-windbg-parte-2.md:    
carregando-dlls-arbitrarias-pelo-windbg-parte-2.md:    .foreach /pS 5 $$pula; ( addr $$alias; { .dvalloc 0x1000 $$saída; } ) { r$t0 = addr }
carregando-dlls-arbitrarias-pelo-windbg-parte-2.md:    
carregando-dlls-arbitrarias-pelo-windbg-parte-2.md:    Allocated 1000 bytes starting at 00280000
carregando-dlls-arbitrarias-pelo-windbg-parte-2.md:    
carregando-dlls-arbitrarias-pelo-windbg-parte-2.md:    1         2    3     4        5  6
carregando-dlls-arbitrarias-pelo-windbg-parte-2.md:    Allocated 1000 bytes starting at 00280000
carregando-dlls-arbitrarias-pelo-windbg-parte-2.md:    
carregando-dlls-arbitrarias-pelo-windbg-parte-2.md:    r$t0 = addr
carregando-dlls-arbitrarias-pelo-windbg-parte-2.md:    
carregando-dlls-arbitrarias-pelo-windbg-parte-2.md:    eza @$t0 "${$arg1}"
carregando-dlls-arbitrarias-pelo-windbg-parte-2.md:    
carregando-dlls-arbitrarias-pelo-windbg-parte-2.md:    r $t1 = @$t0 + 0x100
carregando-dlls-arbitrarias-pelo-windbg-parte-2.md:    
carregando-dlls-arbitrarias-pelo-windbg-parte-2.md:        $$ push $ip
carregando-dlls-arbitrarias-pelo-windbg-parte-2.md:        eb @$t1 0x68
carregando-dlls-arbitrarias-pelo-windbg-parte-2.md:        ed @$t1 + 0x01 @$t2
carregando-dlls-arbitrarias-pelo-windbg-parte-2.md:        $$ pushfd
carregando-dlls-arbitrarias-pelo-windbg-parte-2.md:        eb @$t1 + 0x05 0x9c
carregando-dlls-arbitrarias-pelo-windbg-parte-2.md:        $$ pushad
carregando-dlls-arbitrarias-pelo-windbg-parte-2.md:        eb @$t1 + 0x06 0x60
carregando-dlls-arbitrarias-pelo-windbg-parte-2.md:        $$ push $t0
carregando-dlls-arbitrarias-pelo-windbg-parte-2.md:        eb @$t1 + 0x07 0x68
carregando-dlls-arbitrarias-pelo-windbg-parte-2.md:        ed @$t1 + 0x08 @$t0
carregando-dlls-arbitrarias-pelo-windbg-parte-2.md:        $$ call LoadLibrary
carregando-dlls-arbitrarias-pelo-windbg-parte-2.md:        eb @$t1 + 0x0c 0xe8
carregando-dlls-arbitrarias-pelo-windbg-parte-2.md:        ed @$t1 + 0x0d ( kernel32!LoadLibraryA - @$t1 - 0x11 )
carregando-dlls-arbitrarias-pelo-windbg-parte-2.md:        $$ popad
carregando-dlls-arbitrarias-pelo-windbg-parte-2.md:        eb @$t1 + 0x11 0x61
carregando-dlls-arbitrarias-pelo-windbg-parte-2.md:        $$ popfd
carregando-dlls-arbitrarias-pelo-windbg-parte-2.md:        eb @$t1 + 0x12 0x9d
carregando-dlls-arbitrarias-pelo-windbg-parte-2.md:        $$ ret
carregando-dlls-arbitrarias-pelo-windbg-parte-2.md:        eb @$t1 + 0x13 0xc3
carregando-dlls-arbitrarias-pelo-windbg-parte-2.md:    
carregando-dlls-arbitrarias-pelo-windbg-parte-2.md:    ( kernel32!LoadLibraryA - @$t1 - 0x11 )
carregando-dlls-arbitrarias-pelo-windbg-parte-2.md:    
carregando-dlls-arbitrarias-pelo-windbg-parte-2.md:    push    offset ntdll!DbgBreakPoint (7c901230) ; empilhamos o IP atual (endereço de retorno)
carregando-dlls-arbitrarias-pelo-windbg-parte-2.md:    pushfd ; salva estado das flags atual
carregando-dlls-arbitrarias-pelo-windbg-parte-2.md:    pushad ; salva estado dos registradores atual
carregando-dlls-arbitrarias-pelo-windbg-parte-2.md:    push    8F0000h ; empilha endereço do path da dll a ser carregada
carregando-dlls-arbitrarias-pelo-windbg-parte-2.md:    call    kernel32!LoadLibraryA (7c801d77) ; chamamos LoadLibraryA
carregando-dlls-arbitrarias-pelo-windbg-parte-2.md:    popad ; restaura estado dos registradores
carregando-dlls-arbitrarias-pelo-windbg-parte-2.md:    popfd ; restaura estado das flags
carregando-dlls-arbitrarias-pelo-windbg-parte-2.md:    ret ; retorna para o ponto onde o depurador parou (no caso, 7c901230)
carregando-dlls-arbitrarias-pelo-windbg-parte-2.md:    
carregando-dlls-arbitrarias-pelo-windbg-parte-2.md:    u @$ip
carregando-dlls-arbitrarias-pelo-windbg-parte-2.md:    
carregando-dlls-arbitrarias-pelo-windbg-parte-2.md:    bp /1 @$t2 ".dvfree @$t0 0"
carregando-dlls-arbitrarias-pelo-windbg.md:    <Ctrl + Break> $$ pára a execução em um ponto qualquer
carregando-dlls-arbitrarias-pelo-windbg.md:    gu $$ volta para função chamadora para evitar perda do estado dos registradores
carregando-dlls-arbitrarias-pelo-windbg.md:    r$t0 = @$ip $$ armazena ponteiro de instrução em registrador temporário
carregando-dlls-arbitrarias-pelo-windbg.md:    Diga para o WinDbg o que vem por aí
carregando-dlls-arbitrarias-pelo-windbg.md:    
carregando-dlls-arbitrarias-pelo-windbg.md:    Note que usamos dois pseudo-registradores ($t0, o primeiro registrador temporário do WinDbg, e $ip, o registrador que aponta para a próxima instrução que será executada), mas só um deles possue o prefixo '@'. Esse prefixo diz ao WinDbg que o que segue é um registrador. Como o comando r já é usado com registradores, é desnecessário usá-lo para $t0. Se usarmos sintaxe C++ esse prefixo é obrigatório, enquanto na sintaxe MASM não. Porém, se não usarmos esse prefixo em registradores não-comuns (como é o caso para $ip) o WinDbg primeiro tentará interpretar o texto como um número hexadecimal. Ao falhar, tentará interpretar como um símbolo. Ao falhar novamente, ele finalmente irá tratá-lo como um registrador. A diferença na velocidade faz valer a pena digitar um caractere a mais. Faça a prova!
carregando-dlls-arbitrarias-pelo-windbg.md:    
carregando-dlls-arbitrarias-pelo-windbg.md:    .dvalloc 0x1000 $$ alocamos memória para entrar o assembly e o parâmetro da chamada
carregando-dlls-arbitrarias-pelo-windbg.md:    Allocated 1000 bytes starting at 00280000
carregando-dlls-arbitrarias-pelo-windbg.md:    eza 0x00280000 "C:tempMinhaDllInvasora.dll" $$ escreve no início da memória o path da DLL
carregando-dlls-arbitrarias-pelo-windbg.md:    a 0x0280000+0x100 $$ agora vamos codificar em live-assembly
carregando-dlls-arbitrarias-pelo-windbg.md:    00280100 push 0x00280000 $$ empilha o parâmetro (path da DLL)
carregando-dlls-arbitrarias-pelo-windbg.md:    push 0x00280000
carregando-dlls-arbitrarias-pelo-windbg.md:    00280105 call kernel32!LoadLibraryA $$ chama LoadLibraryA
carregando-dlls-arbitrarias-pelo-windbg.md:    call kernel32!LoadLibraryA
carregando-dlls-arbitrarias-pelo-windbg.md:    0028010a int 3 $$ um breakpoint para tornar as coisas mais fáceis
carregando-dlls-arbitrarias-pelo-windbg.md:    int 3
carregando-dlls-arbitrarias-pelo-windbg.md:    0028010b $$ um <enter> em uma linha vazia termina a edição do live-assembly
carregando-dlls-arbitrarias-pelo-windbg.md:    0:000> $$ estamos de volta no prompt do WinDbg
carregando-dlls-arbitrarias-pelo-windbg.md:    
carregando-dlls-arbitrarias-pelo-windbg.md:    0:000> r$ip = 0x00280000+0x100
carregando-dlls-arbitrarias-pelo-windbg.md:    0:000> g
carregando-dlls-arbitrarias-pelo-windbg.md:    ModLoad: 10000000 10045000   C:tempMinhaDllInvasora.dll
carregando-dlls-arbitrarias-pelo-windbg.md:    ModLoad: 76390000 763ad000   C:WINDOWSsystem32IMM32.DLL
carregando-dlls-arbitrarias-pelo-windbg.md:    (398.d90): Break instruction exception - code 80000003 (first chance)
carregando-dlls-arbitrarias-pelo-windbg.md:    eax=10000000 ebx=7ffdd000 ecx=7c801bf6 edx=000a0608 esi=001a1f48 edi=001a1eb4
carregando-dlls-arbitrarias-pelo-windbg.md:    eip=0028010a esp=0007fb24 ebp=0007fc94 iopl=0         nv up ei pl zr na pe nc
carregando-dlls-arbitrarias-pelo-windbg.md:    cs=001b  ss=0023  ds=0023  es=0023  fs=003b  gs=0000             efl=00000246
carregando-dlls-arbitrarias-pelo-windbg.md:    0028010a cc              int     3 $$ esse é o breakpoint que digitamos no código
carregando-dlls-arbitrarias-pelo-windbg.md:    0:000> r$ip = $t0 $$ mudando o IP para o ponto original
carregando-dlls-arbitrarias-pelo-windbg.md:    *** WARNING: Unable to verify checksum for C:tempMinhaDllInvasora.dll
carregando-dlls-arbitrarias-pelo-windbg.md:    0:000> g
carregando-dlls-arbitrarias-pelo-windbg.md:    ModLoad: 5cb70000 5cb96000   C:WINDOWSsystem32ShimEng.dll
carregando-dlls-arbitrarias-pelo-windbg.md:    ModLoad: 6f880000 6fa4a000   C:WINDOWSAppPatchAcGenral.DLL
carregando-dlls-arbitrarias-pelo-windbg.md:    ModLoad: 76b40000 76b6d000   C:WINDOWSsystem32WINMM.dll
carregando-dlls-arbitrarias-pelo-windbg.md:    ModLoad: 774e0000 7761d000   C:WINDOWSsystem32ole32.dll
carregando-dlls-arbitrarias-pelo-windbg.md:    ...
classe-objeto-contexto-metodo-polimorfismo.md:    ClasseCpp obj;
classe-objeto-contexto-metodo-polimorfismo.md:    obj.Metodo(); // passando this implicitamente
classe-objeto-contexto-metodo-polimorfismo.md:    
classe-objeto-contexto-metodo-polimorfismo.md:    ClasseC obj;
classe-objeto-contexto-metodo-polimorfismo.md:    obj.Metodo = ClasseC_Metodo;
classe-objeto-contexto-metodo-polimorfismo.md:    obj.Metodo(&obj); // passando this explicitamente
classe-objeto-contexto-metodo-polimorfismo.md:    #include <iostream>
classe-objeto-contexto-metodo-polimorfismo.md:    
classe-objeto-contexto-metodo-polimorfismo.md:    class MinhaClasse
classe-objeto-contexto-metodo-polimorfismo.md:    {
classe-objeto-contexto-metodo-polimorfismo.md:        public:
classe-objeto-contexto-metodo-polimorfismo.md:            void MeuMetodo()
classe-objeto-contexto-metodo-polimorfismo.md:            {
classe-objeto-contexto-metodo-polimorfismo.md:                MeuOutroMetodo();
classe-objeto-contexto-metodo-polimorfismo.md:            }
classe-objeto-contexto-metodo-polimorfismo.md:            virtual void MeuOutroMetodo()
classe-objeto-contexto-metodo-polimorfismo.md:            {
classe-objeto-contexto-metodo-polimorfismo.md:                MinhaPropriedade = 42;
classe-objeto-contexto-metodo-polimorfismo.md:            }
classe-objeto-contexto-metodo-polimorfismo.md:            int MinhaPropriedade;
classe-objeto-contexto-metodo-polimorfismo.md:    };
classe-objeto-contexto-metodo-polimorfismo.md:    
classe-objeto-contexto-metodo-polimorfismo.md:    class MinhaClasseVersao75 : public MinhaClasse
classe-objeto-contexto-metodo-polimorfismo.md:    {
classe-objeto-contexto-metodo-polimorfismo.md:        public:
classe-objeto-contexto-metodo-polimorfismo.md:            virtual void MeuOutroMetodo()
classe-objeto-contexto-metodo-polimorfismo.md:            {
classe-objeto-contexto-metodo-polimorfismo.md:                MinhaPropriedade = 75;
classe-objeto-contexto-metodo-polimorfismo.md:            }
classe-objeto-contexto-metodo-polimorfismo.md:    };
classe-objeto-contexto-metodo-polimorfismo.md:

code-jam-2019-qualification-round.md:    
code-jam-2019-qualification-round.md:    void calc(string& N, string& A, string& B)
code-jam-2019-qualification-round.md:    {
code-jam-2019-qualification-round.md:      for( size_t i = 0; i < N.size(); ++ i)
code-jam-2019-qualification-round.md:      {
code-jam-2019-qualification-round.md:        if( N[i] == '4' )
code-jam-2019-qualification-round.md:        {
code-jam-2019-qualification-round.md:          A.push_back('3');
code-jam-2019-qualification-round.md:          B.push_back('1');
code-jam-2019-qualification-round.md:        }
code-jam-2019-qualification-round.md:        else
code-jam-2019-qualification-round.md:        {
code-jam-2019-qualification-round.md:          A.push_back(N[i]);
code-jam-2019-qualification-round.md:          B.push_back('0');
code-jam-2019-qualification-round.md:        }
code-jam-2019-qualification-round.md:      }
code-jam-2019-qualification-round.md:    }

code-jam-2019-qualification-round.md:      {

code-jam-2019-qualification-round.md:        cin >> N;
code-jam-2019-qualification-round.md:        string A, B;
code-jam-2019-qualification-round.md:        calc(N, A, B);
code-jam-2019-qualification-round.md:        cout << "Case #" << i+1 << ": " << stoi(A) << " " << stoi(B) << endl;
code-jam-2019-qualification-round.md:      }   
code-jam-2019-qualification-round.md:    }
code-jam-2019-qualification-round.md:    #include <iostream>
code-jam-2019-qualification-round.md:    #include <string>
code-jam-2019-qualification-round.md:    
code-jam-2019-qualification-round.md:    using namespace std;
code-jam-2019-qualification-round.md:    
code-jam-2019-qualification-round.md:    void calc(string& P)
code-jam-2019-qualification-round.md:    {
code-jam-2019-qualification-round.md:      for( size_t i = 0; i < P.size(); ++ i)
code-jam-2019-qualification-round.md:      {
code-jam-2019-qualification-round.md:          P[i] = P[i] == 'S' ? 'E' : 'S';
code-jam-2019-qualification-round.md:      }
code-jam-2019-qualification-round.md:    }

code-jam-2019-qualification-round.md:      for( int i = 0; i < T; ++ i)
code-jam-2019-qualification-round.md:      {
code-jam-2019-qualification-round.md:        string N, P;
code-jam-2019-qualification-round.md:        cin >> N >> P;
code-jam-2019-qualification-round.md:        calc(P);
code-jam-2019-qualification-round.md:        cout << "Case #" << i+1 << ": " << P << endl;
code-jam-2019-qualification-round.md:      }

code-jam-2019-qualification-round.md:    #include <iostream>
code-jam-2019-qualification-round.md:    #include <map>
code-jam-2019-qualification-round.md:    #include <string>
code-jam-2019-qualification-round.md:    #include <vector>
code-jam-2019-qualification-round.md:    
code-jam-2019-qualification-round.md:    using namespace std;
code-jam-2019-qualification-round.md:    
code-jam-2019-qualification-round.md:    void calc(int N, vector<int>&LS, string& LSS)
code-jam-2019-qualification-round.md:    {
code-jam-2019-qualification-round.md:        map<int, char> alpha;
code-jam-2019-qualification-round.md:        int first1 = 0, first2 = 0;
code-jam-2019-qualification-round.md:    
code-jam-2019-qualification-round.md:        for( int l: LS )
code-jam-2019-qualification-round.md:        {
code-jam-2019-qualification-round.md:            int na = 0;
code-jam-2019-qualification-round.md:    
code-jam-2019-qualification-round.md:            for( auto a: alpha)
code-jam-2019-qualification-round.md:            {
code-jam-2019-qualification-round.md:                if( l % a.first == 0 )
code-jam-2019-qualification-round.md:                {
code-jam-2019-qualification-round.md:                    na = l / a.first;
code-jam-2019-qualification-round.md:                    break;
code-jam-2019-qualification-round.md:                }
code-jam-2019-qualification-round.md:            }
code-jam-2019-qualification-round.md:    
code-jam-2019-qualification-round.md:            if( na )
code-jam-2019-qualification-round.md:            {
code-jam-2019-qualification-round.md:                alpha[na] = ' ';
code-jam-2019-qualification-round.md:                continue;
code-jam-2019-qualification-round.md:            }
code-jam-2019-qualification-round.md:    
code-jam-2019-qualification-round.md:            for( size_t i = 2; i < N; ++i )
code-jam-2019-qualification-round.md:            {
code-jam-2019-qualification-round.md:                if( l % i == 0 )
code-jam-2019-qualification-round.md:                {
code-jam-2019-qualification-round.md:                    int na1 = l / i;
code-jam-2019-qualification-round.md:                    int na2 = i;
code-jam-2019-qualification-round.md:                    if( first1 == 0 )
code-jam-2019-qualification-round.md:                    {
code-jam-2019-qualification-round.md:                        first1 = na1;
code-jam-2019-qualification-round.md:                        first2 = na2;
code-jam-2019-qualification-round.md:                    }
code-jam-2019-qualification-round.md:                    alpha[na1] = ' ';
code-jam-2019-qualification-round.md:                    alpha[na2] = ' ';
code-jam-2019-qualification-round.md:                    break;
code-jam-2019-qualification-round.md:                }
code-jam-2019-qualification-round.md:            }
code-jam-2019-qualification-round.md:        }
code-jam-2019-qualification-round.md:    
code-jam-2019-qualification-round.md:        const char Alphabet[] = { 'A', 'B', 'C', 'D', 'E', 'F', 'G', 'H', 'I', 
code-jam-2019-qualification-round.md:        'J', 'K', 'L', 'M', 'N', 'O', 'P', 'Q', 'R', 'S', 'T', 'U', 'V', 
code-jam-2019-qualification-round.md:        'W', 'X', 'Y', 'Z' };
code-jam-2019-qualification-round.md:    
code-jam-2019-qualification-round.md:        size_t pos = 0;
code-jam-2019-qualification-round.md:        for( auto& a: alpha )
code-jam-2019-qualification-round.md:            a.second = Alphabet[pos++];
code-jam-2019-qualification-round.md:    
code-jam-2019-qualification-round.md:        int first = LS[1] % first1 == 0 ? first2 : first1;
code-jam-2019-qualification-round.md:        LSS.push_back(alpha[first]);
code-jam-2019-qualification-round.md:    
code-jam-2019-qualification-round.md:        for( int i: LS )
code-jam-2019-qualification-round.md:        {
code-jam-2019-qualification-round.md:            int second = i / first;
code-jam-2019-qualification-round.md:            char c = alpha[second];
code-jam-2019-qualification-round.md:            LSS.push_back(c);
code-jam-2019-qualification-round.md:            first = second;
code-jam-2019-qualification-round.md:        }
code-jam-2019-qualification-round.md:    }
code-jam-2019-qualification-round.md:    
code-jam-2019-qualification-round.md:    int main()
code-jam-2019-qualification-round.md:    {
code-jam-2019-qualification-round.md:        int T;
code-jam-2019-qualification-round.md:        cin >> T;
code-jam-2019-qualification-round.md:        for( int i = 0; i < T; ++i)
code-jam-2019-qualification-round.md:        {
code-jam-2019-qualification-round.md:            vector<int> LS;
code-jam-2019-qualification-round.md:            int N, L;
code-jam-2019-qualification-round.md:            cin >> N >> L;
code-jam-2019-qualification-round.md:            int l;
code-jam-2019-qualification-round.md:            for( int n = 0; n < L; ++ n)
code-jam-2019-qualification-round.md:            {
code-jam-2019-qualification-round.md:                cin >> l;
code-jam-2019-qualification-round.md:                LS.push_back(l);
code-jam-2019-qualification-round.md:            }
code-jam-2019-qualification-round.md:            string LSS;
code-jam-2019-qualification-round.md:            calc(N, LS, LSS);
code-jam-2019-qualification-round.md:            cout << "Case #" << i+1 << ": " << LSS << endl;
code-jam-2019-qualification-round.md:        }
code-jam-2019-qualification-round.md:    }

como-apagar-o-prompt-do-seu-programa-windows.md:    void check_console() 
como-apagar-o-prompt-do-seu-programa-windows.md:    {
como-apagar-o-prompt-do-seu-programa-windows.md:      HWND console = GetConsoleWindow(); // obtém a janela do console atual
como-apagar-o-prompt-do-seu-programa-windows.md:      if (! console) return; // se não tiver, paciência
como-apagar-o-prompt-do-seu-programa-windows.md:      unsigned long pid; // vamos pegar o pid do processo relacionado a este console
como-apagar-o-prompt-do-seu-programa-windows.md:      if (! GetWindowThreadProcessId(console, &pid)) return; // se não der, paciência também
como-apagar-o-prompt-do-seu-programa-windows.md:      if (GetCurrentProcessId() != pid) return; // se não formos nós os que criamos este prompt deixa quieto
como-apagar-o-prompt-do-seu-programa-windows.md:      FreeConsole(); // somos nós que criamos: desaloca o console e já eras
como-apagar-o-prompt-do-seu-programa-windows.md:    }
como-apagar-o-prompt-do-seu-programa-windows.md:    
como-apagar-o-prompt-do-seu-programa-windows.md:    int main()
como-apagar-o-prompt-do-seu-programa-windows.md:    {
como-apagar-o-prompt-do-seu-programa-windows.md:        check_console();
como-apagar-o-prompt-do-seu-programa-windows.md:    }

como-fazer-merge-de-projetos-distintos-no-bazaar.md:    
como-fazer-merge-de-projetos-distintos-no-bazaar.md:    >bzr help commands
como-fazer-merge-de-projetos-distintos-no-bazaar.md:    add             Add specified files or directories.
como-fazer-merge-de-projetos-distintos-no-bazaar.md:    annotate        Show the origin of each line in a file.
como-fazer-merge-de-projetos-distintos-no-bazaar.md:    bind            Convert the current branch into a checkout of the supplied branch.
como-fazer-merge-de-projetos-distintos-no-bazaar.md:    branch          Create a new copy of a branch.
como-fazer-merge-de-projetos-distintos-no-bazaar.md:    ...
como-fazer-merge-de-projetos-distintos-no-bazaar.md:    push            Update a mirror of this branch.
como-fazer-merge-de-projetos-distintos-no-bazaar.md:    rebase          Re-base a branch. [rebase]
como-fazer-merge-de-projetos-distintos-no-bazaar.md:    rebase-abort    Abort an interrupted rebase [rebase]
como-fazer-merge-de-projetos-distintos-no-bazaar.md:    rebase-continue Continue an interrupted rebase after resolving conflicts [rebase]
como-fazer-merge-de-projetos-distintos-no-bazaar.md:    rebase-todo     Print list of revisions that still need to be replayed as part of the  [rebase]
como-fazer-merge-de-projetos-distintos-no-bazaar.md:    reconcile       Reconcile bzr metadata in a branch.
como-fazer-merge-de-projetos-distintos-no-bazaar.md:    reconfigure     Reconfigure the type of a bzr directory.
como-fazer-merge-de-projetos-distintos-no-bazaar.md:    register-branch Register a branch with launchpad.net. [launchpad]
como-fazer-merge-de-projetos-distintos-no-bazaar.md:    remerge         Redo a merge.
como-fazer-merge-de-projetos-distintos-no-bazaar.md:    remove          Remove files or directories.
como-fazer-merge-de-projetos-distintos-no-bazaar.md:    remove-tree     Remove the working tree from a given branch/checkout.
como-fazer-merge-de-projetos-distintos-no-bazaar.md:    renames         Show list of renamed files.
como-fazer-merge-de-projetos-distintos-no-bazaar.md:    replay          Replay commits from another branch on top of this one. [rebase]
como-fazer-merge-de-projetos-distintos-no-bazaar.md:    resolve         Mark a conflict as resolved.
como-fazer-merge-de-projetos-distintos-no-bazaar.md:    revert          Revert files to a previous revision.
como-fazer-merge-de-projetos-distintos-no-bazaar.md:    ...
como-fazer-merge-de-projetos-distintos-no-bazaar.md:    whoami          Show or set bzr user id.

como-ofuscar-strings.md:    int main()

como-ofuscar-strings.md:    {

como-ofuscar-strings.md:    	size_t bufferSize;
como-ofuscar-strings.md:    	byte buffer[1];
como-ofuscar-strings.md:    };

como-ofuscar-strings.md:    	buffer[i] ^= key;
como-parsear-argc-argv-para-um-map-stl.md:    /** Interpreta argumentos da linha de comando.
como-parsear-argc-argv-para-um-map-stl.md:    
como-parsear-argc-argv-para-um-map-stl.md:    @author Wanderley Caloni <caloni@intelitrader.com.br>
como-parsear-argc-argv-para-um-map-stl.md:    @date 2015-06
como-parsear-argc-argv-para-um-map-stl.md:    @version 1.0.0
como-parsear-argc-argv-para-um-map-stl.md:    */
como-parsear-argc-argv-para-um-map-stl.md:    #pragma once
como-parsear-argc-argv-para-um-map-stl.md:    #include <map>
como-parsear-argc-argv-para-um-map-stl.md:    #include <string>
como-parsear-argc-argv-para-um-map-stl.md:    
como-parsear-argc-argv-para-um-map-stl.md:    typedef std::map<std::string, std::string> Args;
como-parsear-argc-argv-para-um-map-stl.md:    
como-parsear-argc-argv-para-um-map-stl.md:    inline void ParseCommandLine(int argc, char* argv[], Args& args)
como-parsear-argc-argv-para-um-map-stl.md:    {
como-parsear-argc-argv-para-um-map-stl.md:    	for (int i = 1; i < argc; ++i)
como-parsear-argc-argv-para-um-map-stl.md:    	{
como-parsear-argc-argv-para-um-map-stl.md:    		std::string cmd = argv[i];
como-parsear-argc-argv-para-um-map-stl.md:    		std::string arg;
como-parsear-argc-argv-para-um-map-stl.md:    		if (i < argc - 1 && argv[i + 1][0] != '-')
como-parsear-argc-argv-para-um-map-stl.md:    		{
como-parsear-argc-argv-para-um-map-stl.md:    			arg = argv[i + 1];
como-parsear-argc-argv-para-um-map-stl.md:    			++i;
como-parsear-argc-argv-para-um-map-stl.md:    		}
como-parsear-argc-argv-para-um-map-stl.md:    		args[cmd] = arg;
como-parsear-argc-argv-para-um-map-stl.md:    	}
como-parsear-argc-argv-para-um-map-stl.md:    }
como-parsear-argc-argv-para-um-map-stl.md:    int main(int argc, char* argv[])
como-parsear-argc-argv-para-um-map-stl.md:    {
como-parsear-argc-argv-para-um-map-stl.md:    	Args args;
como-parsear-argc-argv-para-um-map-stl.md:    	ParseCommandLine(argc, argv, args);
como-parsear-argc-argv-para-um-map-stl.md:        // ...
como-parsear-argc-argv-para-um-map-stl.md:    >program.exe --name Agatha --surname Christie --enable-log
como-parsear-argc-argv-para-um-map-stl.md:    if( args.find("--debug") != args.end() )
como-parsear-argc-argv-para-um-map-stl.md:    {
como-parsear-argc-argv-para-um-map-stl.md:        while( ! IsDebuggerPresent() )
como-parsear-argc-argv-para-um-map-stl.md:            Sleep(1000);
como-parsear-argc-argv-para-um-map-stl.md:    }

como-publicar-seu-blog-em-hugo-para-ebook.md:    hugo -D --theme book --destination book
como-publicar-seu-blog-em-hugo-para-ebook.md:    pushd book
como-publicar-seu-blog-em-hugo-para-ebook.md:    rem iconv -f UTF-8 -t LATIN1 index.html > book.html
como-publicar-seu-blog-em-hugo-para-ebook.md:    cp index.html book.html
como-publicar-seu-blog-em-hugo-para-ebook.md:    kindlegen.exe book.opf -o caloni.mobi
como-publicar-seu-blog-em-hugo-para-ebook.md:    if exist k:\ copy /y caloni.mobi k:\documents
como-publicar-seu-blog-em-hugo-para-ebook.md:    popd
